name: Hit the Brakes!
description:
You are on the run from the law! Use adept driving skills to outwit the police, all with the help of an ability to pause everything in the world except you, and your car.

Xbox One controllers can be used to play the game!

Made by:
nythless - Art and Testing  

Luce - Music and Testing

Marilyn Baumer - Programming and Sound Effects (You're already on my page!)

Made for MiniJam 60
